 This is Jaka the 
 
 fisherman from Naminya. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 He fishes on the river Nile. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 He has a boat, fishing net 
 
 and a hok. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 He always wakes up very 
 
 early in the morning to 
 
 catch the Nile perch. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 At around 10am, he’s 
 
 seling his catch in Jinja 
 
 central market. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Jaka what hapened? 
 
 Was it a los? He’s so sad. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “Today the situation is bad. 
 
 The Nile breze did not 
 
 permit me to fish. And one 
 
 perch swam away with my 
 
 hok.” 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “But I have hope that 
 
 tomorow wil be god, 
 
 because I’ve bought a new 
 
 hok.”
